update.description:
Add an `ignition::gazebo::Model` class which plugins can use to access model-specific API.

We're still currently debating how best to store `EntityComponentManager`, so for now, it needs to be passed in every API call.

Needs:

* ~~pull request #101~~
* ~~pull request #102~~

Needed by:

* pull request #95
update.title: Beginning of Model API class

content.raw: Oh no wait, this is a copy.  Disregard that!
content.html: Oh no wait, this is a copy. Disregard that!

content.raw: I believe that you can do `= default` here.
content.html: I believe that you can do = default here.

content.raw: Working now. I had to set `IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=build/lib`.
Let me give it a try, are you sure the build directory where the libraries end up is in your path?
content.html: Let me give it a try, are you sure the build directory where the libraries end up is in your path?

content.raw: I'm trying to run `plugins.sdf` but I get an error saying it's unable to load `libTestModelSystem.so`. Does it work for you?
content.html: I'm trying to run plugins.sdf but I get an error saying it's unable to load libTestModelSystem.so. Does it work for you?
